lead_paragraph: The legislation would impose a moratorium until May 15 on permission for the process known as hydraulic fracturing.
snippet: The legislation would impose a moratorium until May 15 on permission for the process known as hydraulic fracturing.

headline.main: Paterson Weighs Bill to Halt the Issuing of Gas Extraction Permits
headline.seo: Temporary Ban on Gas Drilling Goes to Paterson
headline.print_headline: Paterson Weighs Bill to Halt the Issuing of Gas Extraction Permits
